verse.name: v1
verse.lines: I will seek you oh Lord, while I am in my youth newline and I will trust you oh Lord, and I'll proclaim your truth. newline For you searched and found me, while I was far away, newline In my troubled times, You always keep me safe.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: The Lord is my light and my salvation, newline Whom Shall I fear? Whom Shall I fear? newline The Lord is the stronghold of my life, newline Whom Shall I fear? Whom shall I fear?
